description:
This is an assortment of 8 foods/drinks, including whiskey (revive) and wine (cure-all), that will be useful during emergencies.

The following items are included:
Whiskey x3
Wine x4
Beer x5
Apple x5
Aged Cheese x5
Dahl Foie Gras x3
Big-Boned Meat x5
Seafood Skewer x10

*DLC items can be obtained by entering your room on the second floor of the Dragon Inn after downloading the game.
*This content is available for a limited time only.
ã€€Period: January 6, 2022 - February 16, 2022
name: Local Specialties of Misrid! Foodstuffs for Any Occasion
